title: TYPE BATTLE!
content:
I was wondering if you guys could help me come up with some type themed battles for [http://somethingvssomething.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821040550/http:/somethingvssomething.com/ "http://somethingvssomething.com/")

I feel like David Carson needs to be in there somewhere maybe. Or Helvetica vs. Arial.
author: HaleyFiege

comments.content:
9x7 dot matrix VS Times New Roman

On a TV set at 14 points.

-=®=-

Here are a few proposals:

Best Iconoclastic Graphic Designer.

...or better still: Best Enfant Terrible of Graphic Design.

Best Helvetica Rip-Off.
